message: I think we can do better.  This is a fair starting point for negotiation, but I'm willing to compromise a bit to get this done.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This offer is fair given the inflation, and I think it's time to end this back and forth.
You're getting closer, but not quite there.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give up some more to get this done, but I can't go lower.  The inflation is hurting my share significantly.
You should have taken my previous offer.
